_comment_reloc_tolerance: Extended from default 3 - adaptive tolerance doubles this when semantic match succeeds
_comment_specialized: Specialized discovery for deep category-specific analysis

_comment_specialized_categories.ARCH: Module boundaries, internal package leaks, dependency violations, API consistency
_comment_specialized_categories.QUALITY: Cyclomatic complexity, Java 21 idioms (records, pattern matching, switch expressions), code smells
_comment_specialized_categories.SAFETY: Secrets exposure, input validation, timing attacks, integer overflow, PrivateKey handling
_comment_specialized_categories.PERF: Allocations in loops, blocking in hot paths, regex compile in loops, string concat

_comment_cross_file: Cross-file analysis detects issues spanning multiple files

_comment_cross_file_categories.NULL_PROPAGATION: Track null/Optional returns and their handling across file boundaries
_comment_cross_file_categories.RESOURCE_OWNERSHIP: Track Closeable/AutoCloseable lifecycle across files (esp. PrivateKey)
